content.description: MPinterfaces is a python package that enables high throughput Density Functional Theory (DFT) analysis of arbitrary material interfaces (ligand capped nanoparticles, surfaces in the presence of solvents and hetero-structure interfaces) using VASP, VASPsol, LAMMPS, materialsproject database as well as their open source tools and a little bit of ASE.
